console=ttyS0,115200n8
devtype=mmc
bootdir=/boot
bootfile=zImage
fdtfile=am335x-bonegreen.dtb
mmcdev=0
mmcpart=2
mmcrootfstype="ext4 rootwait"
dtodir=overlays
dtolist=BB-OVNG-00A0 BB-OVNG-UART1-00A0 BB-OVNG-LCD7-00A0
loadaddr=0x82000000
fdtaddr=0x88000000
fdtsize=0x20000
set_bootpart=setenv bootpart ${mmcdev}:${mmcpart}
set_bootargs=setenv bootargs console=${console} ${optargs} root=/dev/mmcblk${mmcdev}p${mmcpart} rw rootfstype=${mmcrootfstype}
loadfdt=load ${devtype} ${bootpart} ${fdtaddr} ${bootdir}/${fdtfile}
loaddto=fdt addr ${fdtaddr}; fdt resize ${fdtsize}; for overlay in ${dtolist}; do load ${devtype} ${bootpart} ${loadaddr} ${bootdir}/${dtodir}/${overlay}.dtbo; fdt apply ${loadaddr}; done
loadimage=load ${devtype} ${bootpart} ${loadaddr} ${bootdir}/${bootfile}
bootcmd=run set_bootpart; run loadfdt; run loaddto; run loadimage; run set_bootargs; bootz ${loadaddr} - ${fdtaddr}
